article.title: Air Force Selects Northrop Grumman to Develop Simulation Model for Fifth-Generation Data Link
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: The U.S. Air Force has awarded Northrop Grumman Corporation a contract to develop a simulation model for the Multifunction Advanced Data Link waveform. The modeling activity will enable the Air Force to devise improved tactics for use in anti-access environments.
